  • Method Details

    • makePoly

      public static Model.Polynom makePoly​(int d, int c, Model.Polynom n) throws Exception
      Static fabric used to create a polynomial
      Parameters:
      d - degree
      c - coefficient
      n - the next polynomial: needs to have a lower degree than this
      Returns:
      a new polynomial formed by this and n
      Throws:
      Exception - we throw an exception if the format is not respected

    • parsePoly

      public static Model.Polynom parsePoly​(String s) throws NumberFormatException, Exception
      Fabric static used to parse a polynomial from a string
      Parameters:
      s - string form of polynomial ax^n +bx^n-1 ... +zx^0
      Returns:
      a new polynomial based on s
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if we try to parse a string to an int/double
      Exception - we throw an exception if the format is not respected

    • toString

      private String toString​(Model.Polynom n)
      This toString method is used to avoid putting a space before the first polynomial
      Parameters:
      n - null at first, contains the last polynomial each time it is called
      Returns:
      a string based on a polynomial
